title: North Carolina Heritage Series
additional-note: This was a series of reprints of monographic works.  Copyright checks on an issue should also search the distinctive title of the issue as a book. (We have not systematically checked the copyrights of those titles.) Many of the works were originally published long enough ago to be in the public domain, but copyright could have been claimed on new matter in the reprint.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Michael Wisniewski for copyright research on this title.
